title: Distribution of global animal health care market by species 2018
yAxis: Distribution of animal health care market volume
summary: This bar chart has 2 categories for the x axis representing Animal Type, and a y axis representing Distribution of animal health care market volume.
The highest category is found at Food_animal where Distribution of animal health care market volume is 62.0.
The lowest category is found at Companion_animal where Distribution of animal health care market volume is 38.0.
gold: This statistic shows the distribution of the global animal health care market volume in 2018 , by species . In that year , health products for companion animals generated some 38 percent of the total global animal health market volume .
